# SuggestedPalette.SampleDepth property

The number of bits used to represent each color component (Red, Green, Blue, and optionally Alpha) in the palette entries. The sample depth can be either `8` bits or `16` bits per component.

```csharp
public byte SampleDepth { get; set; }
```
